servinfo.title: Body Ventilation Construction
servinfo.ptxt: The body ventilation system of this vehicle has a fresh air intake (1) located at the cowl top panel. When fresh air intake air selector is at FRE position (fresh), ventilating air is drawn into the interior from the cowl center garnish and drawn out from the ventilator outlet (2) provided at each side body outer panel (both right and left side).
